page.title: 20LAW AND ORDER SCRAPTOFT
page.content: There is a police station on Scraptoft Lane,but the main station is on Uppingham Road.There is a local bobby who has a beat in the area,and he or she visits our school.Once we had a police fortnight and a team came every day.They brought a Panda car and told us all about it.A police frogman showed us his kit, and warned of the dangers of playing near water.The dog handler showed us his alsation dog.It can help the police to control fans at the football match. A police woman showed us a film called 'Never Go with Strangers'.Sometimes the police are called out to our school because the lights go on if anyone tries to break in. They often go to the Boys Club if there is trouble.
